name: Bai Mosheng
quote: Don't misunderstand, I just don't want to see you die so pathetically
description: An oppositional personality who wraps care in malice
bio: 1547's oppositional personality, a shadow lurking in her consciousness since her human days. He uses the most vicious words and sharpest criticism to 'hurt' 1547â€”but the essence of this hurt is pulling her back from the brink of collapse in the only way he knows. They exist in opposition, yet depend on each other.
